name: Booby Trap
description:
Booby Trap is a 2D, side-view, casual arcade game where you play as a booby seabird, attempting to survive an ocean oil spill. Is there anything a seabird can do to survive?

Controls:
  • [<-], [->] / [A], [D] - Flap wings
  • [Esc] - Pause
Developed by:

Lusófona University, third and second-year Videogames' Bachelor students at the ULHT's Meaningful GameJam 2022:

  • André Santos (Programmer) - itch.io
  • José Reis (Programmer) - itch.io
  • Madalena Cagido (Artist) - itch.io
  • Tiago Berlim (Artist) - itch.io
